DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , open label , single dose , 2-way crossover study investigate bioequivalence new fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablet nifedipine GITS candesartan correspond loose combination feed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Pivotal Bioequivalence FDC Nifedipine / Candesartan v . Loose Combination Single Components , Fed
DOC.criteria: The informed consent form must sign study specific test procedures do Confirmation subject 's health insurance coverage prior first screen visit Healthy male subject Ethnicity : Caucasian Age : 18 45 year ( inclusive ) first screen visit Body mass index ( BMI ) equal 18 , equal 29.9 kg / mÂ² Ability understand follow studyrelated instruction Suspicion drug alcohol abuse Regular daily consumption 1 L xanthincontaining beverage Intake food beverage contain grapefruit within 2 week prior first study drug administration ( applies pomelos St. John 's Wort ) Use medication within 4 week prior first study drug administration could interfere investigational product ( e.g . CYP3A inhibitor CYP3A inducer ) examples CYP3A inhibitor : erythromycin , inhibitor human HIV protease ( e.g . ritonavir , saquinavir ) , amiodarone , diltiazem , verapamil , fluconazole , itraconazole , ketoconazole , clarithromycin , telithromycin , nefazodon , cimetidine ; examples CYP3A inducer : rifampicin , carbamazepin , phenytoin , phenobarbital , product contain St. John 's Wort ; Systolic blood pressure 116 145 mmHg ( least 15 min supine ) At first screen visit Diastolic blood pressure 95 mmHg ( least 15 min supine ) Heart rate 45 95 beat / min ( least 15 min supine ) first screen visit Clinically relevant finding physical examination Positive urine drug screen alcohol breath test Exclusion period study simultaneous participation clinical study
DOC.keyword: essential hypertension , blood pressure , nifedipine , candesartan , FDC
